title: Dahai Chengzhang Ji Zhi Baowei Jiayuan
title_japanese: 大海成长记之保卫家园
synopsis: The "Iron Horn King" who lives on "POWER Planet" accidentally obtained an "unknown energy block" containing infinite power in the depths of the universe, so he was ambitious and wanted to rule the entire universe. To this end, he must first eliminate the stumbling block to dominate the universe, the S-class intelligent creature-human. The Dahai and his good friend Satsuki who live in the town of Haike, as well as the magical brother from an alien planet, and the four of Diao Diao resolutely fight with the King of Iron Horn in order to defend their beautiful home. (translated from iqiyi)
